CustomField.description: "Program Code is an indentifier that specifies the specific program design to be used by the vendor for a particular order. Key parameters that are set by the program code are: kit type, welcome letter, whether the vendor provides reminders, amoung others. Because our current vendor requires different collection technologies to be used in different geographies (NY/non-NY) the programCode also specifies geo. As such for a single campaign needs to have multiple Program codes associated with it."
CustomField.label: Vendor Program Code
